text: {| |} RFA Tidesurge (A98) was a of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary. Launched in 1954, the ship was originally named Tiderange but was renamed in 1958 to avoid confusion with other members of the class. Decommissioned in 1976, Tidesurge left Portsmouth under tow on 19 April 1977 for Valencia to be broken up. Category:Tide-class replenishment oilers Category:1954 ships
title: RFA Tidesurge (A98)
